title: Cannot load diffxpy
body:
Can't find `batchglm.api.models.glm`. The naming seems to be `glm_beta`, `glm_nb`, or `glm_norm` atm, and not just `glm`.


Error trace:
```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ModuleNotFoundError                       Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-1-4d6dbc2c6594> in <module>
      9 from gprofiler import gprofiler
     10 import batchglm
---> 11 import diffxpy.api as de
     12 import patsy as pat
     13 import logging, warnings

~/anaconda3/envs/sc-tutorial/lib/python3.6/site-packages/diffxpy/api/__init__.py in <module>
----> 1 from . import test
      2 from . import enrich
      3 from . import stats
      4 
      5 from .. import __version__

~/anaconda3/envs/sc-tutorial/lib/python3.6/site-packages/diffxpy/api/test.py in <module>
      1 # from ..testing.base import stats
----> 2 from ..testing.base import two_sample
      3 from ..testing.base import lrt
      4 from ..testing.base import wald
      5 from ..testing.base import t_test

~/anaconda3/envs/sc-tutorial/lib/python3.6/site-packages/diffxpy/testing/base.py in <module>
     18 import patsy
     19 import batchglm.data as data_utils
---> 20 from batchglm.api.models.glm import Model as GeneralizedLinearModel
     21 
     22 from ..stats import stats

ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'batchglm.api.models.glm'
```
